item.title: How to update this Note site
item.description: How to update the notes go to the hugo repository create/update .md file in the site repository add the following content on the top of the file --- title: "How to update this Note site" author: "Jae Song" date: 2019-03-20T11:53:49-07:00 description: "How to update this Note site" type: technical_note or page draft: false --- view the site before saving hugo server -D localhost:1313 check-in the update by commit and push publish the web site to the github.
